php.LBL_FIELDS_DEPENDENCY_DESCRIPTION: Configuration of dynamic fields and blocks depending on specific criteria
php.LBL_VIEWS_INFO: List of views where fields are to be hidden/shown, if a view is not selected the fields will always be visible
php.LBL_FIELDS_INFO: List of fields that will be visible only if the conditions below are met
php.LBL_GUI_INFO:
Enabling it results in a dynamic showing of fields in the form when changing values in fields.
If disabled, the changes will only take effect after saving the data.
php.LBL_MANDATORY_INFO: After enabling all fields listed below will be mandatory
